text: Mr. Nobody is a 2009 science fiction drama movie written and directed by Jaco Van Dormael. It takes place in the future when there is only one survivor named Nemo (means Nobody) left on Earth. The main role (Nemo) was played by American actor and musician Jared Leto. Mr. Nobody had its world premiere at the 66th Venice International Film Festival. There it received the Golden Osella and the Biografilm Lancia Award. == Cast == * Jared Leto as Nemo * Diane Kruger as Anna * Sarah Polley as Ellise * Linh Dan Pham as Jeanne * Rhys Ifans as Nemo's father == Other websites == * * * Category:2009 science fiction movies Category:2009 drama movies Category:Belgian science fiction movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:French science fiction movies Category:French drama movies Category:German science fiction movies Category:German drama movies
title: Mr. Nobody (movie)
